org.apache.taverna.plugin

Interface PluginSiteManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PluginSiteManagerImpl

    public interface PluginSiteManager
    Manages plugin sites.
    Author:
    David Withers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPluginSite(PluginSite pluginSite)
      Adds a plugin site.
      PluginSite createPluginSite(URI pluginSiteURL)
      Contacts the plugin site at the specified URL and return a new plugin site.
      List<PluginVersions> getPlugins(PluginSite pluginSite)
      Returns all the plugins available at the specified plugin site.
      List<PluginSite> getPluginSites()
      Returns all the managed plugin sites.
      void removePluginSite(PluginSite pluginSite)
      Removes a plugin site.

    • Method Detail

      • getPluginSites

        List<PluginSite> getPluginSites()
        Returns all the managed plugin sites.

        If there are no plugin sites an empty list is returned.

        Returns:
        all the managed plugin sites
        Throws:
        PluginException

      • createPluginSite

        PluginSite createPluginSite(URI pluginSiteURL)
                     throws PluginException
        Contacts the plugin site at the specified URL and return a new plugin site.
        Parameters:
        pluginSiteURL - the plugin site URL
        Throws:
        PluginException - if there is a problem contacting the plugin site

      • addPluginSite

        void addPluginSite(PluginSite pluginSite)
            throws PluginException
        Adds a plugin site.

        If the plugin site already exists this method does nothing.

        Parameters:
        pluginSite - the plugin site to add
        Throws:
        PluginException

      • removePluginSite

        void removePluginSite(PluginSite pluginSite)
               throws PluginException
        Removes a plugin site.

        If the plugin site does not exist this method does nothing.

        Parameters:
        pluginSite - the plugin site to remove
        Throws:
        PluginException

      • getPlugins

        List<PluginVersions> getPlugins(PluginSite pluginSite)
                         throws PluginException
        Returns all the plugins available at the specified plugin site.

        If no plugins are available an empty list is returned.

        Parameters:
        pluginSite - the plugin site to contact
        Returns:
        all the plugins available at the specified plugin site
        Throws:
        PluginException - if there is a plroblem contacting the plugin site
